meanings.definition: The back part of the human foot below the ankle.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her heel after walking for a long time.
meanings.sent2: He wore shoes with comfortable heels for the party.
meanings.sent3: The heel of her foot was not happy about the long hike.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the heel that kept him going through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The heel of her foot throbbed with each step she took.

meanings.definition: The part of a shoe or boot supporting the heel.
meanings.sent1: The heel of the shoe provided good support for her foot.
meanings.sent2: The boots had sturdy heels that helped him walk on uneven ground.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally stepped on the heel of her shoe and stumbled.
meanings.sent4: The heel of the boot was like a strong foundation for his steps.
meanings.sent5: The heel of the shoe clicked on the pavement as she walked.

meanings.sent1: He was known as a heel for his dishonest actions.
meanings.sent2: The movie villain was portrayed as a heel who everyone disliked.
meanings.sent3: The heel of the story turned out to be the unexpected hero.
meanings.sent4: She saw him as a heel until she learned about his kind deeds.
meanings.sent5: The heel in the story eventually redeemed himself through selfless acts.

meanings.sent1: The dog would heel whenever his owner called.
meanings.sent2: She asked her friend to heel as they explored the new neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to heel the suspect discreetly.
meanings.sent4: The memories of childhood would always heel her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song would heel in her mind long after it ended.
